description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis- How To Find A Lost Object Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1) A new way to approach retrieving something you have lost.
  • 2) The course gives you ideas and insights for using more of your mind in interesting ways.
  • 3) If you have forgotten the names of your friends or acquaintances; you can even recall their names with self hypnosis using this course.
  • Learn how hypnosis can help you find lost objects with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  • 2) You can alter or change the psychological factors that affect your state of mind with self hypnosis
  • 3) Self hypnosis eases your anxiety

This course is very useful for those are forgetful about things in their daily life and have difficulty in recalling them.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English.

It is ideal for everyone who want to retrieve lost things in their daily life.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6:Guided Visualization Exercise: Relax And Find The Misplaced Object

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8:Bonus Exercise : Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis- How To Find A Lost Object Using Self Hypnosis
